index.title: Hotspot or not?
index.headline: Am I in a Covid-19 Hotspot?
index.subHeadline: Use the RKI data to check whether you are in a Covid-19 Hotspot.

result.noDataHeadline: Unfortuntaly, the RKI does not have any data for this location.
result.incidenceValue: At the moment, the 7 days incidence is {{incidence}}.
result.errorHeadline: Unfortunately, an error occurred while fetching data from the RKI

local.headline: Specific measures for {{area}}
local.linkDescription: Use the following link to find the rules in place for {{area}}

generalLocal.headline: Specific measures
generalLocal.description: Measures can be different dependent on state (Bundesland) and district (Landkreis). Because they often change, please find useful links below.

general.headline: General measures
general.description: Die following measures were decided on a federal level. Keep in mind that they can be different for your state and area.

masksMedium.title: Mask requirement
masksMedium.description: Everywhere in public areas where people have closer contact.

partiesMedium.title: Private parties
partiesMedium.description: At most, 25 people are allowed in the public area, 15 from max. two different households at home.

masksHigh.title: Mask requirement
masksHigh.description: Everywhere in public areas where people have closer contact. Individual extension possible.

partiesHigh.title: Private parties
partiesHigh.description: At most, 10 people are allowed in the public area, 10 from max. two different households at home.

curfew.title: Curfew for restaurants and bars
curfew.description: Curfew starting at 11pm. Also, selling alcohol is prohibited.

contactRestrictions.title: Contact restrictions
contactRestrictions.description: At most, 10 people are allowed in public areas. If additional measures do not have an effect, they can be further extended to max. 5 people or two households.

footer.credits: Made by Sebastian, Julian and Jonas
